resources.string: This privilege grants Tingtel the ability to get your ussd response from popups and display it on the app. Enable Tingtel accessibility service by tapping the toggle switch in the upper right corner. Press the back button twice to return to Tingtel
Tingtel is a unified app to check Data Balance of Networks all over the world
You dont need to memorize ussd codes to check data & airtime balance
To use Tingtel, kindly accept the required permissions, Click on "Get Started"
